title: The Masked Singer: Paulini reveals her secret trick that confused the judges
text:
Paulini Curuenavuli was finally unmasked as The Spider on Tuesday's episode of The Masked Singer Australia.

And the 37-year-old songstress has revealed her clever strategy that allowed her to confuse the judging panel for three weeks.

Speaking to News.com.au on Wednesday, Paulini explained that she deliberately chose unusual songs to throw the judges off the scent.

That's how she did it! Paulini (pictured) has revealed her clever trick that confused the judges on The Masked Singer, after she was finally unmasked as the Spider on Tuesday's episode

Paulini said: 'That was my whole plan from the beginning, trying to figure out all the ways that I could put the judges off.

'I had a strategy: Pick songs that I would never usually do, and perform them differently from how I'd usually sing a song.'

'I had so much fun changing my voice and my tone,' she concluded.

In shock: The Masked Singer judge Dannii Minogue (pictured) couldn't believe her eyes when Paulini was revealed to be the woman behind the Spider mask

Paulini explained that she enjoyed embodying different personas on stage as she tried to keep her identity a secret from the judges.

During her time on the show, she performed an eclectic range of songs by the likes of Britney Spears, AC/DC and The Cranberries.

The judges had no idea who she was until the Spider dropped a hint about The Young Divas, the girl group Paulina used to be a member of.

Strategy! Speaking to News.com.au on Wednesday, Paulini explained that she deliberately chose unusual songs to throw the judges off the scent

This clue was the final straw for Jackie 'O' Henderson, who was immediately convinced that Paulina was the singer behind the mask.

When it was time to make a decision on Tuesday's episode, Jackie stuck to her guns and was ultimately proved correct.

Fellow judges Dannii Minogue, Lindsay Lohan and Dave Hughes guessed incorrectly and were blindsided by the big reveal.
description: Paulini Curuenavuli was finally unmasked as The Spider on Tuesday's episode of The Masked Singer Australia.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
